name: L'Album Secret de l'Oncle Ernest
notes: The game installer will require the installation of QuickTime 2.1.2. In order to  get through, you'll need to skip the check of existing versions. In the QuickTime, you should click Install, Skip, Yes, Install, Exit.

files.file1: N/A:Select L'Album Secret's autorun.exe or install.exe (on the CD-rom).

content:
files:
- file1: N/A:Select L'Album Secret's autorun.exe or install.exe (on the CD-rom).
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/emme/Album/chapp.EXE
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    executable: file1
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  reset_desktop: true
  resolution: 640x480
wine:
  Desktop: true
  WineDesktop: 640x480
